name: Ryan's Pack
description:
Order your copy here! 

Standard checkout / PayPal checkout

Ryan's Pack is a collection of games created exclusively for physical media. 

Although digital marketplaces are all the rage and these games have debuted on such services, there's simply nothing like being able to grab a game off of your shelf and look at the case! Popping the disc into your computer to play is also a real treat.

Ryan's Pack contains an installer for the package, as well as a uniquely designed launcher that presents the games in an interactive and eloquent fashion.

The games included are:

Dynamite Alex 

Missileman Origins

Garrison Gauntlet

Ice Cream Factory

Android versions of Dynamite Alex and Ice Cream Factory are also included on the disk. If you have an Android device, you'll be able to play these games on the go!

This CD-ROM works on Windows computers ranging from Windows XP all the way to Windows 10. Performance on modern hardware may vary, though.

It is highly recommended you download the demos featured here to test the games' performance on your system before you buy.

(Cover art by WhiskerMidi)
